mapper.select: SELECT C.C_CODE c_code, C.C_NAME c_name, SUM(M.M_AMOUNT) m_amount FROM AC_MONTH M, AC_CATEGORY C WHERE M.C_CODE = C.C_CODE AND M.M_ID = #{m_id} AND C.C_CODE LIKE 'D%' AND M.A_CODE = #{a_code} GROUP BY C.C_CODE, C.C_NAME ORDER BY C.C_CODE

SELECT 항목, 금액 FROM ( SELECT '식비' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'C%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH UNION SELECT '생활' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'D%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH UNION SELECT '교통' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'E%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH UNION SELECT '정기결제' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'F%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH UNION SELECT '패션' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'G%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH UNION SELECT '뷰티' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'H%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH UNION SELECT '문구' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'I%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH UNION SELECT '교육' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'J%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH UNION SELECT '문화' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'K%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH UNION SELECT '건강' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'L%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH UNION SELECT '기타' AS 항목, (SELECT AVG(M_AMOUNT) FROM AC_MONTH WHERE C_CODE LIKE 'M%' AND m_id = #{m_id}) AS 금액 FROM AC_MONTH ) ORDER BY CASE WHEN 항목 = '식비' THEN 1 WHEN 항목 = '생활' THEN 2 WHEN 항목 = '교통' THEN 3 WHEN 항목 = '정기결제' THEN 4 WHEN 항목 = '패션' THEN 5 WHEN 항목 = '뷰티' THEN 6 WHEN 항목 = '문구' THEN 7 WHEN 항목 = '교육' THEN 8 WHEN 항목 = '문화' THEN 9 WHEN 항목 = '건강' THEN 10 WHEN 항목 = '기타' THEN 11 END
